title: Why you should consider moving to Lipa, Batangas?
text:
NESTLED between the majestic peaks of Mount Malarayat and Mount Maculot, Lipa boasts a picturesque plateau with a climate 2 to 5 degrees cooler than the surrounding areas, making it an ideal destination year-round.
Explore the hiking trails of the nearby mountains, dive into the vibrant underwater world of Anilao, or relax on the pristine white sand beaches of Laiya and the coastal resorts of Calatagan, all just a short 1 to 2-hour drive away.
Lipa’s central location offers easy access to major cities and attractions. Makati, airport, Alabang, Tagaytay, Cavite, Laguna, and the stunning beaches and mountain resorts of greater Batangas province are all about an hour’s reach.
Site blessing, open house
Join this weekend for the site blessing and open house of Bel-Air Villas, the latest premier project by Convergence Realty, Lipa’s earliest major developer with a proven track record of successful projects in this thriving city.
Situated in the tranquil yet conveniently accessible Barangay Balintawak, just 2 minutes from the new 6-lane Manila-Batangas Bypass Road and 5 minutes from the STAR-Toll Highway, Bel-Air Villas offers an unbeatable location. Plus, it’s only an hour’s drive to Manila via the SLEX-STAR Toll-Balete Exit.
A city of entrepreneurs on the rise
Lipa was ranked among the Top 5 New Wave Cities of 2020, recognized as one of Southern Luzon’s busiest business hubs. With a population growing at almost 3 percent annually, compared to the national average of 1.5 percent, Lipa is a dynamic city with a promising future. Boasting over 8 universities, including DLSU, National University, and Batangas State University, Lipa is a thriving educational hub attracting students from across the region.
Generous amenities, family-fun attractions
Experience the best of modern living in Lipa, with sprawling shopping centers ranging from SM to Robinsons to The Outlets, university town, wellness and medical centers, and a vibrant cultural scene, among many other family-friendly offerings.
Known as “The Little Rome of the Philippines,” Lipa is home to stunning churches like the historic San Sebastian Cathedral and the famous Mt. Carmel Chapel, renowned for the miraculous Rose Petal Shower. The city is home to annual pilgrimages and several museums including the ancestral home of our National hero Jose Rizal’s first love, Segunda Katigbak. Top developers, from Ayala to Rockwell, are investing big in Lipa, further enhancing its appeal.
Discover Bel-Air Villas; success starts with the right location
Designed with modern families in mind, Bel-Air Villas offers generously sized homes with lots starting at 120 sqm. Enjoy a wealth of family-friendly amenities, including a clubhouse, pools, playgrounds, and tranquil pocket gardens scattered throughout the community. With 24-hour security, residents can enjoy peace of mind in this thriving neighborhood.
Take your family home to the fastest-growing urban and nature hub in the Philippines. Ready to explore Lipa and Bel-Air Villas? Schedule a special site visit and city tour by calling 0969-2000-888.
